metadata.title: CVE-2015-9383 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
FreeType before 2.6.2 has a heap-based buffer over-read intt_cmap14_validate in sfnt/ttcmap.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.8.1-2ubuntu2
libfreetype6 - 2.8.1-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.1-2ubuntu2').
